revised_title: A New Bolometric Method for Determining Radiant Efficiencies of Radiating Bodies
tldr: The authors propose a new bolometric method for measuring the radiant efficiency of gas fires, replacing the previous radiometer-cum-thermopile device with a more accurate and sensitive bolometer. The new method allows for greater range of accuracy and sensitivity, and can be used at greater distances from the fire, making it a more reliable and efficient way to measure radiant efficiency.
